original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2561)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2561)@</color>召喚聖獸麒麟分身，在指定區域內奔行，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2561)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>與<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2561)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對範圍內的敵人造成傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2561)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2561)@</color> Summon the sacred beast unicorn clone and run in the designated area with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2561)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color>and <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2561)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> to cause damage to enemies within range.
